price: 53. Ils avaient, auparavant, mécru en Lui, et voulaient atteindre (de leurs mensonges) l’Inconnaissable (ghayb) depuis un endroit très éloigné.
arabic: وَقَدۡ كَفَرُواْ بِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَيَقۡذِفُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ مِن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqad kafarū bihi min qablu wayaqdhifūna bil-ghaybi min makānin baʿīdin
